entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
